Any two (2) ‘A’ level 
passes.  
  
Five (5) SSC credit passes to 
include English language 
and four (4) other relevant 
subjects.  
  
Any  three 
 (3) 
subjects.  
  
DIRECT ENTRY  
(i) AAU accepts three (3) A' level passes with two (2) 
‘O' level credit passes or two (2) 'A' level passes 
with three (3) 'O' level credit passes.  
(ii) AAUA requires two (2) 'A' level subjects or ND in 
Law, Religious Studies or Philosophy from 
approved Institutions or NCE merit.           
(iii) AUGUSTINE accepts NCE merit/ND credit in 
relevant subjects/programme in addition to five 
(5)'O' level credit passesor equivalent.  
(iv) BENIN accepts  
a) an overall NCE credit in the Liberal Arts.   
b) fISt degree in any programme.   
c) ND  or  HND  upper  credit  in 
 Mass  
Communication.  
(v) BOWEN accepts two (2) ‘A’ level passes in 
Philosophy and any other subject.  
(vi) BSU accepts NCE/'A' level passes including CRS, 
African Religion or its equivalent.  
(vii) CALABAR accepts any two (2) 'A' level passes in  
relevant subject.  
(viii) IBADAN requires two (2) 'A' level passes in one 
Arts subject and any other Arts/Social Sciences 
/Sciences subject.  
(ix) IMSU, PHC and EKSU -No Direct Entry.  
(x) LAGOS   requires very good passes in three (3)  
JUPEB/'A' level subjects  
a) any three (3) of Literature in English, 
Igbo/Yoruba, CRS/IS, French, History, 
Economics, Government, Chemistry, Physics, 
Biology but at least one (1)Arts subject.  
b) related programmes with a minimum of 55% 
average score  
c) NCE credit in two (2) teaching subjects one  
(1) of which must be Arts subject.
